```{r}
s <- "here\nthere"
```


```{r}
cat(s, "\n", 1+1, "\n")
```

```{r}
for (i in 1:10) {
    i2 <- i^2
    cat (i, "Square is", i2, "\n")
}
```

```{r}
for (n in 1:10){ 
    n <- "^^^^^^^^"
    cat (n, "\n")
  }
```
```{r}
for (line in 1:6){ 
    num_rows <- line
    for (i in 1:num_rows){
      cat("^")
    }
    cat("\n")
  }
```
